description:
Skeyer Chain is a decentralized content integration service platform based on blockchain technology. It solves the current content industry pain points through blockchain technology and achieves incentives and monetization of user behavior,distinguishes and confirms creator’s content copyright to provide participants in the content industry with a safe, stable and reliable content publishing and acquisition environmentand.Then build a new blockchain content platform with high quality content, various forms, efficient realization and flexible mechanism.

At present, SKEYER CHAIN has worked with many high-quality blockchain content projects and partners around the world to build a broad ,rigorous ,efficient SKE application ecosystem. The first phase of cooperation projects include “General Edition Himalayan” – Know More International Co ., Ltd.) and so on.

Its cooperative applications have won more than 100 blockchain landmark patents and won the fifth place in the global blockchain enterprise patent in 2017; It’s also the first batch of domestic blockchain information service filing enterprises of China Netcom Office and the winner of Wharton China-US Summit Entrepreneurship Award.
name: Skeyer Chain
